text: Robert McCurdy (February 26, 1952July 29, 2020) was an American college basketball player. He played for the Richmond Spiders from 1973 to 1975. He began his collegiate career with the Virginia Cavaliers before transferring to Richmond. He was born in Deer Park, New York. McCurdy died on July 29, 2020 from anal cancer in Connecticut, aged 68. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:Deaths from anal cancer Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Sportspeople from New York (state)
title: Bob McCurdy
